Login.title: Welcome back!
Login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

SignUp.title: Nice to meet you!
SignUp.subtitle: Fill the form bellow and start securing your data

User.title: Users
User.subtitle: Handle everything related to user management in here. You can create, activate, deactivate, ban, edit, delete and assign roles to users.
User.createDescription: Fill the form bellow to create a new user
User.editDescription: Edit the form bellow to update the user
User.deleteDescription: Everything related to this user will be deleted, consider banning the user instead
User.deleteLabel: Type the user's full name to confirm
User.createFailed: We couldn't create the user. Please try again later
User.updateFailed: We couldn't update the user. Please try again later
User.deleteFailed: We couldn't delete the user. Please try again later
User.seeDescription: This dialog contains the information of the user and it's certificates

Org.title: Organizations
Org.subtitle: Handle everything related to organization management in here. You can delete and see organization's data here.
Org.name: Name
Org.deleteDescription: Everything related to this organization will be deleted, consider banning the organization instead
Org.deleteLabel: Type the organization's name to confirm
Org.deleteFailed: We couldn't delete the organization. Please try again later
Org.seeDescription: This dialog contains the information of the organization and it's certificates
Org.verifyDescription: This organization will be able to perform operations using the platform
Org.verifyLabel: Type the organization's name to verify

Verifying.title: Verifying your organization
Verifying.subtitle: We're reviewing your details to ensure everything is in order. Once we'll done you'll receive an email letting you know you can start using our services.

Hall.title: Welcome aboard!
Hall.subtitle: We've sent you a confirmation email. Please check your inbox to verify your account. If yout still haven't recieved one you can request it again

Onboarding.title: Organization data
Onboarding.subtitle: We need the following information about your organization in order to avoid fraud. Please fill the form bellow.

Inactive.title: Account needs activation
Inactive.subtitle: Your account is currently inactive.
Inactive.content: Let's help you get back on track. Your account has been deactivated, but don't worry reactivating is quick and simple.

reasons.title: A few reasons why your account might be inactive:
reasons.1: You haven't logged in for an extended period

Inactive.howToReactivate: To reactivate your account, just click the button below. You may need to review and update your account details.

NeedHelp.title: Need help? Contact our support team at

Credential.title: Credentials
Credential.subtitle: Handle everything related to credentials in here. You can delete and see credentials's data here.
Credential.deleteDescription: This credential will be deleted from the database but the holder will still keep the copy, you'll loose control over it, consider revoking it instead
Credential.deleteLabel: Type the credential's id to confirm
Credential.seeDescription: This page contains the information of the credential
Credential.createDescription: Select the form template you want to use, fill the data and generate a QR that can be scanned by the holder
Credential.selectDescription: Select the form that you want to use as template
Credential.validitySubtitle: Fill this section if you need this credential either to be valid from a certain date or valid until a certain date (or both)

CredentialRequest.scanSubtitle: By scanning this QR the holder will be able to share verified documents and prove his/her identity

Bridge.title: Bridges
Bridge.subtitle: Handle everything related to bridges in here. You can configure them and toggle on/off them. Bridges allow your holders to generate credentials from Web2 data.

email.editDescription: Edit the form bellow to configure which email domains are allowed
email.emailBridgeWillBePublished: Submiting the form will create and publish a form version for this bridge.
email.title: Email
email.description: This bridge allows a holder to claim that it belongs to your organization through a credential that contains their organization email.

FormVersion.title: Forms
FormVersion.subtitle: Handle everything related to your organization's forms in here. You can create, edit, see, delete, publish and archive your forms.
FormVersion.createDescription: A form allows the issuers from your organization to emit credentials using a template
FormVersion.editDescription: Edit the form bellow to update it's contents
FormVersion.seeDescription: This page contains the information of the form's latest version and it's preview
FormVersion.deleteDescription: Everything related to this form will be deleted, consider archiving the form instead
FormVersion.deleteLabel: Type the form's title to confirm
FormVersion.searchFailed: Something went wrong with your search
FormVersion.descriptionPlaceholder: This credential claims that the user belongs to the organization...
FormVersion.formNotInDraft: This form is not in draft, modifying it will create new version that can be later published.
FormVersion.dontEditBridge: Don't edit this form manually, if you want to edit this form do it in the bridge section.
FormVersion.publishDescription: The latest version of this form will be published in the blockchain allowing you to emit and validate credentials based on it.
FormVersion.publishLabel: Type the form's title to confirm
FormVersion.archiveDescription: This form version will be archived which means it won't be possible to emit new credentials using this one, you can still validate content using it.
FormVersion.archiveLabel: Type the form's title to confirm
FormVersion.validitySubtitle: Configure validity dates if you want the credentials generated from this form to be valid from a certain date or to be valid until a certain date. You can leave this blank if if prefered.

ConfirmAccount.title: Confirm your account
ConfirmAccount.subtitle: Fill the form below and start issuing credentials
ConfirmAccount.resendSucceded: A new confirmation link has been sent to your email

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot password
ForgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

Did.title: Descentralized IDs
Did.subtitle: Handle everything related to DIDs in here. You can see and delete them. DIDs represent your digital identity in a descentralized way where your digital identity is linked to a universal identifier.
Did.seeDescription: This dialog contains the information of the did
Did.deleteDescription: Everything related to this DID will be deleted, consider revoking the keys instead
Did.deleteLabel: Type the did's id to confirm

Generic.warningMessage: This action is irreversible, please be sure

errors.retryLater: Please try in 5 minutes. If the error persits please contact us.
